name: Stitch! Super Chef
storyline: Ever since Reuben teased Angel for her (lack of) culinary skills, Stitch has made it his sole mission to become the ultimate sandwich chef. In doing so, he would ascend above Reuben's legendary sandwich making AND have the ability to give Angel a hands-on lesson! A win-win scenario.
summary: A Chinese-exclusive iOS match-3 game based on the Stitch! anime.
